scripts.dev: concurrently "turbo dev" "inkeep dev" "sleep 3 && open http://localhost:3000" --names "APIs,UI,Browser" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" --success first
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$VERCEL" = "1" ] && [ "$SKIP_APP_INSTALL" != "1" ]; then inkeep dev --export --output-dir ./apps/manage-ui && SKIP_APP_INSTALL=1 pnpm -C apps/manage-ui install --no-frozen-lockfile --ignore-scripts; fi
